product_name: Oakley Hall Pass Sunglasses - Women's - Black Iridium Lens
long_description: The small, rectangular Oakley Hall Pass Sunglasses let you enjoy the warmth of the sun's rays without the harsh glare. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses offer great durability. Metallic black frames feature Black Iridium lenses that offer excellent all-purpose performance and true color perception in sunny conditions and extremely bright light. Nylon frames are lightweight, stress resistant and flexible for long-term wear. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that extends the peripheral view. Oakley Hall Pass Sunglasses feature earpads and nosepads that ensure a snug, secure fit.
short_description: The small, rectangular Oakley Hall Pass Sunglasses let you enjoy the warmth of the sun's rays without the harsh glare.
